content:
Private, shared history stream created by Lukas Stevens. Description:

No description.
Lukas Stevens changed the access permissions for this stream from Private, shared history to Web-public.

Kevin Kappelmann changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators can post.

Lukas Stevens changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

No description.

  • New description:

A mirror of the Isabelle users mailing list up to 2020-08.
Messages newer than 2020-08 can be found in the #Mirror: Isabelle Users Mailing List stream.
